Get the Resample Description

Get the Resample Description

getHyperControlResampling(hyper.control)

Arguments

hyper.control

[HyperControl] The Hyperparameter Control Object

Value

[ResampleDesc|ResampleInstance].

See also

Other HyperControl: getHyperControlMeasures, getHyperControlMlrControl, makeHyperControl, setHyperControlMeasures, setHyperControlMlrControl, setHyperControlResampling
